short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes premieres from Youtube results since they're annoying.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NoMoPromo removes results from the Youtube subscriptions page which are links to "premieres". I personally want my subscriptions page to be a simple chronological list of videos I've subscribed to - the link to something I couldn't see yet was annoying. So I removed them.
